TravelGroundBadMountain.Title: Travel Ground Bad Mountain
Items: deep rocky ravines criss-cross in your way, making for tiresome and time-consuming obstacles
scree covering the slopes make walking treacherous
the densely-packed boulders here make movement difficult
thick underbrush has destroyed all traces of any other typical routes
the stinging nettles this area is rife with complicate all movement
the sandy scree here belabors every step as feet sink into it
the thick blanket of fallen snow is tiresome to trudge through
a swift river you weren?t expecting runs across your direction of travel
giant stands of thornbushes are constantly in the way
the area is absolutely choked with brambles
there is a wide riverbed in the way with trickling water and steep, cliff-like sides
large fallen boulders periodically block your path
the uneven ground strewn with rocks adds to the difficulty
the thick underbrush makes it twice as frustrating
what seemed like solid, cracked mud on the ground at first turned out to be only a dried layer atop actual, terribly thick mud
impossibly deep mud exhausts every effort to traverse it- as every step sinks into it nearly a foot deep
the ground is absolutely infested with thorn-riddled picker bushes here
the extremely narrow passages here make single-file travel the only option
this area is rife with loose gravel patches on the slopes
the whole area is comprised of dusty, barren cliff faces towering above
